_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_MyCases_SitePage

_a-0000ebda-7a5a-8000-9cbc-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_Case_LatestExternalMessageLogic
_a-0000ebda-7a5a-8000-9cbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*Query the comments for the last updated time for a public comment/message*/
  rule!CMGT_QR_GetComment(
    returnType: "SINGLE_OBJECT",
    caseId: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.caseId],
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Comment.isPrivate,
      operator: "=",
      value: false
    ),
    includeChildComments: true,
    fields: recordType!CMGT_Comment.modifiedOn,
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 1,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!CMGT_Comment.modifiedOn,
        ascending: false
      )
    )
  )[recordType!CMGT_Comment.modifiedOn]

_a-0000ebce-f0a8-8000-9cb7-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_Data_FAQ

_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_Cases_Sub_Details
CMGT_LA_ContactUs_SitePage
_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!wideScreen: {
    "TABLET_LANDSCAPE",
    "DESKTOP_NARROW",
    "DESKTOP",
    "DESKTOP_WIDE"
  },
  local!isWide: if(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"(local!wideScreen),
    true,
    false
  ),
  local!brandingMap: rule!CMGT_LA_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap(),
  local!cardContents: {
    a!map(
      icon: "route",
      primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:4e3ef87a-79b4-4265-9acc-4a60a59afb46",
      secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0e59183d-ceb8-4e08-b342-c3704b0339fb"
    ),
    a!map(
      icon: "envelope-open-text",
      primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:df06c87d-8287-42d5-bc69-fde3f05456df",
      secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:3776350f-f695-4121-9bea-882cca9fb507",
      secondaryTextColor: local!brandingMap.AccentColor
    ),
    a!map(
      icon: "phone",
      primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:ee1803bc-9e8f-4b4e-a88a-8becc2273b03",
      secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:82892d17-51e6-4891-9c38-08edd267307b"
    ),
    a!map(
      icon: "clock",
      primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:ed3148bf-71fb-49f7-8c4c-e646bdc3ace0",
      secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:2b172caa-494e-46e0-9bea-971c5a156d0f"
    )
  },
  rule!CMGT_LA_SitePages_HeaderLayout(
    title: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:40d0922a-76ca-4317-803e-abc716449ef0",
    description: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:ef723e1b-d1b7-483d-be2c-e36c5d493c35",
    height: "SHORT_PLUS",
    contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
      columns: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(contents: {}, width: "EXTRA_NARROW" ,showWhen: local!isWide),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
          contents: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
              contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                items: local!cardContents,
                expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
                  contents: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
                      items: {
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
                          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_stampField"(
                            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                            icon: fv!item.icon,
                            size: "SMALL",
                            shape: local!brandingMap.StandardStampShape,
                            marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS",
                            marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS",
                            contentColor: local!brandingMap.StandardStampContentColor,
                            backgroundColor: local!brandingMap.StandardStampBackgroundColor
                          ),
                          width: "MINIMIZE"
                        ),
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(width: "MINIMIZE"),
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
                          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                            value: {
                              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                                text: fv!item.primaryText,
                                style: "STRONG",
                                color: local!brandingMap.PrimaryTextColor,
                                size: "MEDIUM"
                              ),
                              char(10),
                              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                                text: fv!item.secondaryText,
                                color: a!defaultValue(
                                  fv!item.secondaryTextColor,
                                  local!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor
                                )
                              )
                            },
                            marginAbove: "LESS"
                          )
                        )
                      },
                      alignVertical: "TOP",
                      marginAbove: "NONE",
                      marginBelow: "NONE"
                    )
                  },
                  height: "AUTO",
                  padding: "LESS",
                  marginAbove: "LESS",
                  marginBelow: if(fv!isLast, "LESS", "STANDARD"),
                  shape: local!brandingMap.CardShape,
                  showBorder: false,
                  showShadow: local!brandingMap.CardShowShadow,
                  style: local!brandingMap.CardBackgroundColor
                )
              ),
              shape: local!brandingMap.CardShape,
              showBorder: false,
              showShadow: local!brandingMap.CardShowShadow,
              padding: "STANDARD",
              style: local!brandingMap.SecondaryCardBackgroundColor
            )
          }
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(contents: {}, width: "EXTRA_NARROW",showWhen: local!isWide)
      },
      marginAbove: "STANDARD",
      marginBelow: "EVEN_MORE"
    ),
    brandingMap: local!brandingMap
  )
)

_a-0000e9ca-3659-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_GetSiteUrl
_a-0000e9ca-3659-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!authedPath: cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
    extract(linktodocument(0, "doc"), """", "/doc/")
  ),
  local!subdomainWithDomain: extract(local!authedPath, "//", "/suite")[1],
  local!subdomain: split(local!subdomainWithDomain, ".")[1],
  a!map(
    subdomain: local!subdomain,
    authedPath: local!authedPath,
    subdomainWithDomain: local!subdomainWithDomain
  )
)

_a-0000ee1d-9667-8000-9d8a-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_BillboardLayout

_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_Home_SitePage

_a-0000e990-c462-8000-9ba7-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_QR_GetComment

_a-0000e9dc-ab93-8000-9bc2-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_CustomPaging

_a-0000ec34-784f-8000-9cd6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SELF_LA_ClaimCaseDisplayLink
_a-0000ec34-784f-8000-9cd6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
  tooltip: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9f595600-9750-4407-a85c-3915147ac978",
  value: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: upper(
        #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9f595600-9750-4407-a85c-3915147ac978"
      ),
      color: a!defaultValue(ri!linkColor, ri!brandingMap.WhiteColor),
      link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_safeLink"(
        label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Claim Case"),
        uri: rule!CMGT_UTIL_GetSiteUrl().authedPath & "/sites/" & cons!CMGT_LA_TXT_URL_ADDRESS_IDENTIFIER & "/page/" & cons!CMGT_SELF_URL_STUB_SITE_PAGE_CLAIM_CASE,
        openLinkIn: "SAME_TAB"
      ),
      linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
    )
  },
  showWhen: a!defaultValue(ri!showActions, false),
  align: "CENTER",
  marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS",
  preventWrapping: true()
)

_a-0000e98b-cfe0-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord

_a-0000ebc5-ba33-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_HomePage_FAQ

_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_Sub_ActiveCases
_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!activeCases),
  /* No Active Cases */
  rule!CMGT_LA_EmptyState_NoActiveCases(brandingMap: ri!brandingMap),
  /* Active Cases */
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
    columns: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
        contents: {},
        width: if(
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"({ "TABLET_LANDSCAPE", "DESKTOP_NARROW" }),
          "EXTRA_NARROW",
          "NARROW"
        ),
        showWhen: and(count(ri!activeCases) = 2, ri!isWide)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
        contents: {},
        width: if(
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"({ "TABLET_LANDSCAPE", "DESKTOP_NARROW" }),
          "NARROW",
          "MEDIUM"
        ),
        showWhen: and(count(ri!activeCases) = 1, ri!isWide)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
        contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardGroupLayout"(
          cards: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: ri!activeCases,
            expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
              contents: rule!CMGT_LA_Cases_Sub_Details(
                case: fv!item,
                brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
              ),
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
                label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Record Link" & fv!index),
                recordType: recordType!CMGT_Case,
                identifier: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Case.caseId],
                openLinkIn: "SAME_TAB"
              ),
              height: "AUTO",
              style: ri!brandingMap.CardBackgroundColor,
              shape: ri!brandingMap.CardShape,
              padding: "STANDARD",
              showBorder: ri!brandingMap.CardShowBorder,
              showShadow: ri!brandingMap.CardShowShadow
            )
          ),
          spacing: "STANDARD",
          cardWidth: "MEDIUM",
          marginBelow: "EVEN_MORE",
          fillContainer: true()
        )
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
        contents: {},
        width: if(
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"({ "TABLET_LANDSCAPE", "DESKTOP_NARROW" }),
          "EXTRA_NARROW",
          "NARROW"
        ),
        showWhen: and(count(ri!activeCases) = 2, ri!isWide)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
        contents: {},
        width: if(
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"({ "TABLET_LANDSCAPE", "DESKTOP_NARROW" }),
          "NARROW",
          "MEDIUM"
        ),
        showWhen: and(count(ri!activeCases) = 1, ri!isWide)
      )
    }
  )
)

_a-0000ee1d-9667-8000-9d8a-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_HomePage_FAQCard

_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_SitePages_HeaderLayout
_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!wideScreen: {
    "TABLET_LANDSCAPE",
    "DESKTOP_NARROW",
    "DESKTOP",
    "DESKTOP_WIDE"
  },
  local!isWide: if(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"(local!wideScreen),
    true,
    false
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headerContentLayout"(
    header: {
      rule!CMGT_LA_BillboardLayout(
        headerBackgroundImage: ri!headerBackgroundImage,
        height: ri!height,
        isWide: local!isWide,
        title: ri!title,
        brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
        description: ri!description,
        headerImage: ri!headerImage,
        showHeader: ri!showHeader,
        showActions: ri!showActions
      )
    },
    contents: ri!contents,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.DefaultBackgroundColor
  )
)

_a-0000ebaa-19ba-8000-9ca6-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap

_a-0000ebc5-ba33-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SELF_LA_SitePage_ClaimCase

_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SELF_BannerForClaimCase
_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(ri!claimStatus),
  a!match(
    value: ri!claimStatus,
    equals: "CASE_NOT_FOUND",
    then: rule!CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent(
      type: "ERROR",
      showBackground: true,
      message: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:5ae7310c-ae2e-4f96-b73e-4dacc31e22ca",
      showIcon: true,
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
    ),
    equals: "CASE_ALREADY_CLAIMED",
    then: rule!CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent(
      type: "INFO",
      showBackground: true,
      message: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:4ee9eeee-e2bf-4344-9692-47bbc0710624",
      showMyCasesLink: true(),
      showIcon: true,
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
    ),
    equals: "CASE_CLAIMED",
    then: rule!CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent(
      type: "SUCCESS",
      showBackground: true,
      message: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:25a63ceb-c6b6-4c09-b73c-291e7191ea62",
      showMyCasesLink: true(),
      showIcon: true,
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
    ),
    default: rule!CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent(
      type: "WARN",
      showBackground: true,
      message: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:11635be5-9841-4e72-9abc-3e0b2acd145c",
      showIcon: true,
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
    )
  ),
  {}
)

_a-0000e99c-1217-8000-9ba9-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_FormatDateTime

_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SELF_MessageBannerComponent
_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
  contents: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
      items: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: a!match(
                value: ri!type,
                equals: "SUCCESS",
                then: "check-circle",
                equals: "ERROR",
                then: "exclamation-circle",
                equals: "WARN",
                then: "warning",
                default: "info-circle"
              ),
              color: a!match(
                value: ri!type,
                equals: "SUCCESS",
                then: ri!brandingMap.PositiveAccentColor,
                equals: "ERROR",
                then: ri!brandingMap.NegativeAccentColor,
                equals: "WARN",
                then: ri!brandingMap.WarningAccentColor,
                default: ri!brandingMap.InfoAccentColor
              ),
              size: "MEDIUM"
            )
          ),
          width: "MINIMIZE",
          showWhen: ri!showIcon = true
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: ri!message, size: "STANDARD")
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:4a5a2804-42aa-4e8c-a334-2d0f23f402b4"
                },
                style: { "STRONG" },
                link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_safeLink"(
                  uri: rule!CMGT_UTIL_GetSiteUrl().authedPath & "/sites/" & cons!CMGT_LA_TXT_URL_ADDRESS_IDENTIFIER & "/page/cases",
                  openLinkIn: "SAME_TAB"
                ),
                linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
              ),
              char(32),
              char(32),
              char(32),
              char(32)
            },
            showWhen: a!defaultValue(
              value: ri!showMyCasesLink,
              default: false()
            )
          ),
          width: "MINIMIZE"
        ),

      },
      alignVertical: "MIDDLE",
      marginAbove: "LESS",
      marginBelow: "LESS"
    )
  },
  height: "AUTO",
  style: if(
    ri!showBackground = true,
    a!match(
      value: ri!type,
      equals: "SUCCESS",
      then: ri!brandingMap.PositiveBackgroundColor,
      equals: "ERROR",
      then: ri!brandingMap.NegativeBackgroundColor,
      equals: "WARN",
      then: ri!brandingMap.WarningBackgroundColor,
      default: ri!brandingMap.InfoBackgroundColor
    ),
    ri!brandingMap.WhiteColor
  ),
  marginBelow: "NONE",
  showBorder: false,
  decorativeBarPosition: "START",
  decorativeBarColor: a!match(
    value: ri!type,
    equals: "SUCCESS",
    then: ri!brandingMap.PositiveAccentColor,
    equals: "ERROR",
    then: ri!brandingMap.NegativeAccentColor,
    equals: "WARN",
    then: ri!brandingMap.WarningAccentColor,
    default: ri!brandingMap.InfoAccentColor
  )
)

_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_EmptyState_NoActiveCases
_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
  contents: {
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_DisplayEmptyState(
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
      primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:520141cc-c5f1-4ac4-9040-29fa478d58d2",
      docImage: ri!brandingMap.NoActiveCasesImage,
      additionalContent: {
        rule!CMGT_LA_ActionsAndLinks(
          brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
          claimCaselinkColor: ri!brandingMap.AccentColor,
          recordActionStyle: "TOOLBAR_PRIMARY",
          showActions: true,
          alignCenter: true()
        )
      },
      imageSize: "SMALL"
    )
  },
  height: "AUTO",
  padding: "MORE",
  marginBelow: "MORE",
  showBorder: false(),
  style: "TRANSPARENT"
)

_a-0000ee26-d1e0-8000-9d8e-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_LA_ActionsAndLinks

_a-0000e9f4-1323-8000-9bd3-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap

_a-0000ec22-0443-8000-9cd2-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_DisplayEmptyState

_a-0000e98b-cfe0-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_QR_GetCase
